Package creation

package creation
  • Class
    Description
    BodyHandler
    The BodyHandler class is used to handle all body elements of the document.
    DocumentCreator
    The DocumentCreator class is responsible for starting the creation process, and saving the document to the specified path.
    DocumentMetaDataWriter
    The DocumentMetaDataWriter class is responsible for reading the document's configurations in order to set the document's metadata.
    HeaderStamp
     
    LineFactory
    The LineFactory class is an essential part of the document creation process, used to render formatted text to the document.
    PageAssembler
     
    PageFactory
     
    PageNumberStamp
     
    Text
    The Text class resembles text that should be rendered on the document.
    TextAlignment
    The TextAlignment enumeration determines how text is rendered in a document.
    TextStyle
    The TextStyle enumeration determines what font is used for a rendered text.
    TitleStamp
    The TitleStamp class is used to print the document title to the current document position
